Package com.ultreon.craft.client.gui.old

Interface Widget

All Superinterfaces:
Drawable, GuiStateListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiComponent, GuiContainer
public interface Widget extends GuiStateListener, Drawable
Static widget, a widget that only has boundaries and something that will be drawn. This is like an image, or text label. The GuiComponent class extends this and has input handling support.
See Also:
